Rice___Bacterial_Leaf_Blight.name: Bacterial Leaf Blight
Rice___Bacterial_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, proper irrigation practices, and crop rotation.
Rice___Bacterial_Leaf_Blight.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Garlic extract, Baking soda spray.
